maintenance.heading: Sorry
maintenance.body: The app is currently unavailable due to maintenance.

slides.heading: Free Food
slides.body: Earn one dollar for every dollar spent

slides.heading: Rewards
slides.body: Unlock status tiers and rewards today

email.heading: Set Up Your Account
email.fieldTooltip: This is not a valid email address

mobileNumber.heading: Set Up Your Account
mobileNumber.body: Hi [name], can we please get your mobile number?
mobileNumber.helper: We need to verify your mobile number in case we need to reach you!

mobileNumberVerification.heading: Set Up Your Account
mobileNumberVerification.body: We have sent an SMS to [phone] with a link. Please follow that link to continue.

mobileNumberVerified.heading: Awesome Sauce!
mobileNumberVerified.body:
Your $5 welcome voucher is on it's way.
Oh but you need to set a password.

passwordSuccess.heading: You're In!
passwordSuccess.body:
If you picked up a card in store add it now...
Otherwise lets go!

slides.heading: Earn Dollars With Each Purchase
slides.body: The bigger the purchase the more dollars you get.

slides.heading: Track Your Dollars
slides.body: See in-app how many dollars your have earnt and burnt.

slides.heading: Claim Points For Upgrades and Extras
slides.body: Scan your Rewards App at the register.

slides.heading: Bonus Offers Will Appear In My Offers
slides.body: Like a free meal on us for your birthday!

home.scanHelp: Having trouble scanning? Turn your mobile sideways or tap for card info.
home.tierHelp: To reach [next tier] you need to...

unverifiedMobileNumber.heading: Unverified Number
unverifiedMobileNumber.body: We noticed your mobile number was not verified. Do you want to update your contact number?

mobileNumberVerification1.heading: Verify Mobile Number
mobileNumberVerification1.body: Hi [name], can we get your mobile number?
mobileNumberVerification1.helper: We need to verify your mobile number in case we need to reach you!

mobileNumberVerification2.heading: Verify Mobile Number
mobileNumberVerification2.body:
We have sent an SMS to [phone] with your verification link.
If you haven't received your SMS you can resend below or update contact details.
mobileNumberVerification2.helper: We need to verify your mobile number in case we need to reach you!

mobileNumberVerification3.heading: Thanks For Verifying Your Mobile Number
mobileNumberVerification3.body: Your $5 welcome voucher is on it's way.
mobileNumberVerification3.helper: You will use these details to login so ensure you use details where we can reach you.

unverifiedEmail.heading: Unverified Email
unverifiedEmail.body: We noticed your email was not verified. Do you want to update your email address?

emailVerification1.heading: Verify Email
emailVerification1.body: Hi [name], we couldn't verify your email. Please update below.
emailVerification1.fieldTooltop: This is not a valid email address
emailVerification1.helper: We need to verify your email in case we need to reach you!

emailVerification2.heading: Verify Email
emailVerification2.body:
We have sent a verification email to [email].
If you haven't received an email you can resend below or update contact details.
emailVerification2.helper: We need to verify your email in case we need to reach you!

emailVerification3.heading: Email Verified
emailVerification3.body: Your $5 welcome voucher is on it's way.

updatePassword4.heading: Password Updated
updatePassword4.body: Your $5 welcome voucher is on it's way.

updatePhone1.heading: Update Phone Number
updatePhone1.body: Updating your phone number will require it to be re-validated.

updatePhone3.heading: Confirm New Phone Number
updatePhone3.body: We have sent you an SMS to validate your new phone number.

accountDeletion.heading: Are Your Sure?
accountDeletion.body: If you delete your account you will lose your points and cards associated with this account.

deleteAccount1.heading: Please let us know why you want to delete your account

deleteAccount2.helper: Select as many as you want
options: I don't use this app anymore

deleteAccount3.heading: We are sad to see you go
deleteAccount3.body: Although you are leaving us, we still value the good times we had together./nSo here's a free upsize you can use on your next purchase on us.

deleteAccount4.heading: Break Up Offer
deleteAccount4.body1: Don't forget to screen shot this offer!
deleteAccount4.body2: I'm sure we can still be friends.

addCard2.heading: Add Your Rewards Card
addCard2.body: Please enable camera access to scan your QR code/Barcode
addCard2.error: We weren't able to access your camera

verifyCard2.heading: Verify Your Card
verifyCard2.body: Enter the PIN number found on the backside of your card
verifyCard2.error: We weren't able to verify your card. You can always try again in-app.

margeCard1.heading: This card is already linked to an account. Do you want to merge these accounts?
margeCard1.body: You don't get the points but any further points accumulated with this card will be attributed to your account... But the original account needs verify by email to check that this is legit.

mergeCard2.heading: An email has been sent to the email associated with this card

mergeSuccess.body: Your accounts have been merged! Way to give yourself an extra $[dollars]! Hungry?

mergeNotConfirmed.heading: Card Merge Not Confirmed
mergeNotConfirmed.body: Do you want us to resend the email?

removeCard.heading: Are You Sure?
removeCard.body: You will no longer be able to use this card to acquire points.

Bronze.title: Bronze
Bronze.copy: You are a [tier] member. For every $20 you spend you will earn $1.
Bronze.nextTierCopy: To progress to the [nextTier] tier simply spend X dollars in a calendar month.

Silver.title: Silver
Silver.copy: You are a [tier] member. For every $17 you spend you will earn $1.
Silver.nextTierCopy: To progress to the [nextTier] tier simply spend X dollars in a calendar month.

Gold.title: Gold
Gold.copy: You are a [tier] member. For every $15 you spend you will earn $1.
Gold.nextTierCopy: To progress to the [nextTier] tier simply spend X dollars in a calendar month.

Platinum.title: Platinum
Platinum.copy: You are a [tier] member. For every $15 you spend you will earn $1.

Staff.title: Crew
Staff.copy: You are a [tier] member. For every $15 you spend you will earn $1.
